item.title: Staff area
item.dc:creator: @Elvemage_0o Elvemage 0o
item.description:
@Elvemage_0o wrote:

heres the codes ofr admins and mod

admin first

} if (playerRights == 2) { sendMessage("Welcome to (your Server)"); sendMessage("psst go to ::specialspot"); newWelc();

Mod Second:

} if (playerRights == 1) { sendMessage("Welcome to (yourServer)"); sendMessage("psst go to ::specialspot"); newWelc();

thats for when they log in

now for the code to bring to to the spot

} } else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("Specialpot")) { if (teleblock == true) { sendMessage("A magical force stops you from teleporting."); // made by Mod Allstar } else { teleportToX = ####; teleportToY = ####; sendMessage( "You teleport to the StaffZone");

there you go hope ur happy

Read full topic
